messages.message:
Hey team, reposting this need again here (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-4174). This is a massive differentiator for us and there is no easy way to demo this to our customers to showcase the value. This was very apparent in a demo today with @Aditi

If we have spare design capacity even having a Figma style mockup that we could activate with a button click would be useful in the meantime!

cc @jack.robbins

Completely echo this. Both in conversations with partners and what they are being asked from clients, the capability to monitor and access actual metrics is important - and even just being able to show this in demo version only will be very beneficial!

Good to hear the dashboard is well-received!

Totally hear the needs & benefits of this one, but unfortunately it won't be possible in Q2 given ongoing customer-committed priorities. However, if there is spare capacity on the soleng side / elsewhere in GTM in the short term, something outside of the product could be built to automatically replenish a demo dashboard (ongoing file generation & processing definitely seems feasible), & maybe use the legacy human review APIs like some customers do.

Otherwise, a more manual workaround is to periodically upload files to the same deployment. I have a script that auto-generates simple txt docs if I need new ones - I roughly once a week upload a few files to this deployment to keep data flowing:  https://aihub.instabase.com/deployments/01922adb-aa87-7886-91b6-49e2d713ada2/metrics?asOfTime=1749570044424
